title: How 2 - Build A MIDGE Stove.pdf
description:
Instructions for Building the MIDGE Stove

(Modified Inverted Downdraft Gasifier Experiment)


Question: How well does this stove gasify?

One of the worst smells I can think of is smoldering cigarette buts. If you want to prove to yourself how well this little device gasifies, fill it full of old cigarette buts, add a little lamp oil and light it off. There should be very little smell, if any at all.


Be careful and enjoy stretching the boundaries of gasification.

Have fun with this truly remarkable homebrew Stove. The whole concept can be scaled up to provide very efficient burning of Wood and all the volatile gases in the process!

Andy M

Take a look at my free website for many more great things to do with sustainable energy. 

Website is via clicking on the pictures in the PDF file, all I ask is you take a look at some of the adverts on the site to enable me to carry on helping you lot!
